executor.hint: Whether the creature that executes the ability will be associated with this condition.
executor.label: Associate Executor

relation.hint: What the relationship between the effect and condition is.

target.hint: Whether to open a dialog to select tokens that will be associated with this condition.
target.label: Select Associations

common.hint: Simple one-off effects that don't require customization.
common.label: Impacts

duration.hint: A formula that evaluates to a number of the specified unit.
duration.label: Formula

mode.hint: The arithmetic operation to apply to this effect's duration.
mode.label: Mode

hacks.hint: The types of hack damage that this can apply.

reverse.hint: Remove hacks instead of adding them.
reverse.label: Reverse

pseudoHook.hint: The hook that executes this macro when fired.
pseudoHook.label: Hook

relation.hint: Whether this macro can be run as a button from the chat message or hooks into other behavior.

hex.hint: Whether this is a hexproof roll.

formula.hint: The formula to use for the roll.
formula.label: Formula

merge.hint: Whether to merge this roll with other valid rolls of the same type that have merging enabled.
merge.label: Merge

relation.hint: Apply, remove, toggle, or include the condition as part of the ability's effect.

amount.hint: A numerical amount of the effect to take. Leave blank to have it be the result of the roll.
amount.label: Amount

bonus.hint: Formula that defines a bonus that gets added to the roll. Can be negative.
bonus.label: Bonus

threshold.hint: Formula that defines the DC for this roll. Can be left blank.
threshold.label: Threshold

abilityNames.hint: Abilities that this can directly cause the execution of.
abilityNames.label: Abilities

boosts.hint: A number of boosts to apply.
boosts.label: Boosts

crit.hint: Double the number of dice rolled. This applies after boosts and deboosts.
crit.label: Go Critical

deboosts.hint: A number of deboosts to apply
deboosts.label: Deboosts

formula.hint: The original formula. Make changes as needed, but do not directly apply boosts or deboosts.
formula.label: Roll Formula

ERRORS.cannotPull: Bag has {bagCount} stones. Cannot pull {toPullCount} stones from it.
ERRORS.maxStones: Bag has {count} stones. Maximum of 99 allowed.

PANEL.descriptionText: You are surrounded by darkness, but aren't alone. Something is reaching out to you. Something? Several things? It's not clear. You reach back, grasp something, and start to pull. It pulls you as well.
PANEL.name: Death Bag

consumeHitDice.hint: Check this if hit dice should be consumed on use.
consumeHitDice.label: Consume Hit Dice

forDamage.hint: Check this if the healing should be done for damage.
forDamage.label: For Damage

Heal.hintNoDice: Click on the hacks you want to heal.
Heal.hintWithDice: Click on the hacks you want to heal and the hit dice you want to spend.
Heal.title: Healing

general.hint: This macro checks whether any actor that's selected has some {label} named {name} and makes them all use it.
general.label: General

linked.hint: This macro connects to this specific instance of {child} on {actor}.
linked.label: Linked

NewDocument.content: Would you like to import an existing {typeName} or create one from scratch?
NewDocument.title: New {name}

createChildren.hint: If checked, will create children that aren't present in the local document.
createChildren.label: Create Children

deleteChildren.hint: If checked, will delete children that aren't present in the compendium source.
deleteChildren.label: Delete Children

recursive.hint: If checked, refreshes will apply recursively.
recursive.label: Refresh Recursively

updateChildren.hint: If checked, will update children to match the compendium source.
updateChildren.label: Update Children

updateDocument.hint: If checked, will update local document to match the compendium source.
updateDocument.label: Update Document

consumeManaDice.hint: Check this if mana dice should be consumed on use.
consumeManaDice.label: Consume Mana Dice

forDrain.hint: Check this if the revitalizing should be done for drain.
forDrain.label: For Drain

Revitalize.hint: Click on the mana dice you want to spend.
Revitalize.title: Revitalizing

Attunable.hint: Please select an item to attune.
Attunable.title: Select Item

Deattunable.hint: Please select an item to deattune.
Deattunable.title: Select Item

IllusionLevel.hint: If known, select the level of illusion you are attempting to disbelieve.
IllusionLevel.title: Select Illusion Level
IllusionLevel.label: Level

Transformation.hint: Please select a species to transform into.
Transformation.title: Select Species

TransformationLevel.hint: If known, select the level of transformation you are attempting to revert from.
TransformationLevel.title: Select Transformation Level
TransformationLevel.label: Level

SelectDocument.noOptions: There are no valid options to select from.

Condition.hint: The targets will be {conditionName} with respect to the selected creatures.
Condition.title: Select Creatures

bonus.hint: An additional bonus to apply to this roll.
bonus.label: Circumstance Bonus

competence.hint: Whether this roll has proficiency or fluency.
competence.label: Competence

PANELS.name: Mana Die
PANELS.text: You restore the rolled number of @L[Core:Hit Points and Mana Points]{MP}.

PANELS.name: Hit Die
PANELS.text: You restore the rolled number of @L[Core:Hit Points and Mana Points]{HP} and are @L[Keyword:Awaken]{awakened}.

Reroll.title: Reroll Stat Die?
Reroll.content: This stat die is already spent. Would you like to roll it anyways?

disabled.hint: If checked, these dice will not be given to the actor.
disabled.label: Disabled

faces.hint: Number of faces on each die.
faces.label: Faces

PANELS.name: Stat Die
PANELS.title: Description
PANELS.text: You have rolled a stat die.

Identify.ask: Asking GMs to approve identification of {name}.
Identify.title: Identify Item

ReadMagic.ask: Asking GMs to approve reading magic on {name}.
ReadMagic.failPrefix: Could not ask to read magic.
ReadMagic.failure: {name} was not successfully read magic on.
ReadMagic.title: Read Magic

raw.hint: How this interacts with armor and blocking.
raw.label: Piercing

enabled.hint: If this should be able to store other equipment within it.
enabled.label: Storage

maxCount.hint: The maximum number of other pieces of equipment this can store.
maxCount.label: Maximum Count
maxCount.over: Over Maximum Number of Items Carried

maxWeight.hint: The maximum weight this can store.
maxWeight.label: Maximum Weight

weightMultiplier.hint: An amount to multiply the weight of all things this stores by.
weightMultiplier.label: Weight Multiplier

roll.hint: If this expires on a roll, what is the roll that needs to be made?
roll.label: Roll

threshold.hint: What is the minimum value that needs to be rolled in order for this to expire?
threshold.label: Threshold

type.hint: What is the type of thing that causes this to expire?
type.label: What

skip.hint: A number of instances of the trigger firing to skip before this effect expires.
skip.label: Skip

time.hint: What is the timing for the trigger of this effect expiring?
time.label: When

trigger.hint: What is the trigger for this effect expiring?
trigger.label: Trigger

who.hint: Whose turn should this effect attempt to expire on?
who.label: Who

enabled.hint: Whether this effect causes a transformation. Note that this isn't just for "transformation effect"s, but for any case in which another species' stats should be applied (such as animating as an undead).
enabled.label: Causes Transformation

folder.hint: The folder of candidate species to transform into.
folder.label: Folder

image.hint: Optional overriding art to apply to the target.
image.label: Token Art

level.hint: How strong of a transformation this is.
level.label: Transformation Level

multiple.hint: Allow selection of multiple species to transform into at the same time.
multiple.label: Multiple Selection

select.hint: Select a subset of the species to turn into instead of all of them.
select.label: Select

bodyParts.hint: Whether this should suppress body parts not provided by the transformation.
bodyParts.label: Suppress Body Parts

equipment.hint: Whether this should suppress equipment not provided by the transformation.
equipment.label: Suppress Equipment

fluencies.hint: Whether this should suppress fluencies not provided by the transformation.
fluencies.label: Suppress Fluencies

ranks.hint: Whether this should suppress ranks not provided by the transformation.
ranks.label: Suppress Ranks

useFolder.hint: Use a folder of species instead of defining each individually.
useFolder.label: Use Folder

uuids.hint: The species this transforms the target into.
uuids.itemHint: A specific species this transforms the target into.
uuids.label: Species

type.br: Scale P and F off BR
type.lvl: Scale P and F off LVL

grantOnlyText.derived: This ability can only be used with @UUID[{uuid}].
grantOnlyText.label: Granter Only

value.hint: The value of this attribute score.
value.label: Score

raw.hint: The attack penalty incurred when attacking with this.
raw.label: Attack Penalty

inheritTier.hint: Whether this attunement inherits the tier of the target.
inheritTier.label: Inherit Tier

target.hint: The entity that this attunement corresponds to.
target.label: Attunement Target

type.hint: What type of entity this attunement corresponds to.
type.label: Attunement Type

pull.hint: Total number of stones to pull from the Death Bag.
pull.label: Stones to Pull

brScale.hint: Scale bonuses off BR instead of LVL.
brScale.label: Scale off BR

onUse.hint: Abilities which activate only when this is used.
onUse.label: On Use

font.hint: The font to be used for this document's name on its sheet and in chat messages.
font.label: Font

raw.hint: When this formula is true, the document will be hidden and treated as if it doesn't exist.
raw.label: Ephemeral Formula

raw.hint: When this formula is true, the document will be made inactive.
raw.label: Suppressed Formula

DIALOG.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this? This can't be reversed.

gmNotes.hint: A journal entry page with notes about this document.
gmNotes.label: GM Notes

source.hint: UUID of actor whose turn or other information is used to trigger an expiration?
source.label: Actor

absent.hint: What conditions must be absent in order for this ability to be active?
absent.label: Absent Conditions

present.hint: What conditions must be present in order for this ability to be active?
present.label: Present Conditions

dawn.hint: If true, effect expires at dawn.
dawn.label: Dawn Expiration

description.hint: Under what circumstances should this effect expire?
description.label: End Condition

movement.hint: If true, effect expires on movement.
movement.label: Stationary Expiration

sustained.hint: If true, effect expires if its source is deleted or disabled.
sustained.label: Sustained Expiration

consumable.hint: Whether or not this is consumable.
consumable.label: Consumable

onUse.hint: {name} has abilities that can activate on use. Select which to activate.
onUse.title: Activate Abilities

description.initial: Every adventurer is a journeyman before they join their first @L[Category:Classes]{class}.
description.label: Description

revealed.hint: Whether this has been revealed from an identify or other source.
revealed.label: Revealed

deleteEffect.content: This species is provided by a transformation effects. Would you like to delete that as well?
deleteEffect.title: Delete Transformation Effect

enabled.hint: Whether or not this species has a size associated with it.
enabled.label: Size
